A single tape may yield multiple audio files if there were variations in tape stock, speed, or channels (i.e. stereo or mono). For more information see http://deepblue.lib.umich.edu/handle/2027.42/108126.
audio_item.dc.abstract: [Side 1] : [Part 1] : NIght Call radio program dated October 6, 1969. Featuring Robert F. Williams talking about his time in Cuba.
